meta.scope: Political Party & Governance Opinion Survey conducted at Feb 2014

data.key: I'm going to read you two statements. After I read each one, please tell me which one is closer to your own opinion

values.label: BNP calling blockades and hartals will force AL to agree to BNPs demands
BNP calling blockades and hartals will not force AL to agree to BNP?s demands

data.key: What do you think BNP can do to have their demands met?

values.label: Take non violent activities to fulfill the demand

data.key: What do you think the government should do to stop violence?

values.label: For ensuring peoples?safety take severe action to control the violent situation

data.key: Do you support or oppose the use of violence in political protests?
Please tell me if you strongly agree, somewhat agree, somewhat disagree or strongly disagree with the following statement: ?Law should be enacted to restrict hartal?
